condition: [AND]([EQ](<*VALUE(Exp HS Redundant Servers)*>,No),[GEQ](<* IsNull(<*VALUE(Exp HS Quantity of Flex Station)*>,0)*>,0))
name: MZ-SQLCL4 Set1
action: <* DoNotResetAtt *><*SELECTVALUE(Experion_HS_PART_SUMMARY:MZ-SQLCL4)*><*SETATVQTY(Experion_HS_PART_SUMMARY:MZ-SQLCL4, <*Eval(1+ <*VALUE(Exp HS Quantity of Flex Station)*>)*>)*><* DoResetAtt *>
description: CXCPQ-45837 Condition - Quantity of Flex Station + 1 if Redundant Server = No
